certifications.title: Introduction to Cloud Development with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

projects.name: Blog Website
projects.description: Developed a blog platform with 13+ RESTful APIs for managing blogs, users, and comments, enabling full CRUD operations. Created reusable components in ReactJS, implemented Material-UI for custom theme setup, and optimized routing using React Router to enhance navigation and user experience. Integrated RESTful APIs using Node.js to streamline data management, improve backend efficiency, and enhance overall application performance.

projects.name: Pizza World
projects.description: Built a pizza ordering system with real-time order tracking and an admin panel for managing products and inventory. Implemented secure backend routes utilizing Node.js and MySQL for order handling and authentication; system now supports up to 1,000 concurrent users, ensuring uninterrupted access during peak transaction periods. Optimized frontend design with ReactJS and Tailwind CSS for an intuitive and responsive user experience.

projects.name: E-commerce Platform (Click2Buy)
projects.description: Created reusable UI components that enhanced development efficiency, allowing the team to deploy features 30% faster; supporting the management of over 10,000 concurrent users during peak shopping seasons. Integrated secure RESTful APIs using Node.js and MongoDB to manage product data and streamline order processing, improving system security and operational efficiency.

experiences.description: Developed a blog website utilizing ReactJS for the frontend and Node.js for the backend, ensuring a responsive, scalable solution with efficient API integration and optimized performance. Built 13+ APIs in Node.js for user authentication, post creation, and CRUD operations to ensure secure data handling. Designed and executed API integration strategies that enhanced the frontend architecture; achieved a reduction in server response time by 50%, resulting in a smoother user journey and increased retention rates.

Created a library management system using ReactJS and Node.js, focusing on user-friendly interfaces and efficient backend services to streamline data management. Developed 25+ RESTful APIs in Node.js for managing users, books, and borrowing processes with CRUD functionality. Aligned front and backend to improve data synchronization, boosting application performance by 20%.
